channel.title: [PI] Help Please
channel.description:
How do I make this stuff cost cash, not EPP. There's some items there that cost EPP in different shops, and I want it to cost EPP in one shop, and cash in another. How do I change this to make this shop cost cash and how would I change the prices of the items?
[img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/points.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] Help Please
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“James-RevolutionX, post:3, topic:405939”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=502932.msg3679447#msg3679447 date=1311441565]
ActionHandler.java
[/quote]

What?
ActionHandler.java is to assign an object or a npc to be clickable. ‘firstclick’ and ‘secondclick’.

Shopassistant.java to make it cash and not epp/tokkul and underneath the public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) method is where the cases are.[/quote]
There are more EPP in ActionHandler.java but ye ShopAssistant.java, didn’t look at the pic fully.

Also, all you have to do is change the name EPP to whatever the shop takes.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

Would it still cost EPP in the other shop?

I have a shop that has a few of the items i’m trying to add in this shop.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help Please
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

imsuperman05:

ActionHandler.java

What?
ActionHandler.java is to assign an object or a npc to be clickable. ‘firstclick’ and ‘secondclick’.

Shopassistant.java to make it cash and not epp/tokkul and underneath the public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) method is where the cases are.

Read full topic
